characters.name: Cale  Henituse
characters.description:
__Relatives:__
- Deruth Henituse (father)
- Drew Thames (deceased mother)
- Violan Henituse (stepmother)
- Basen Henituse (younger step-brother)
- Lily Henituse (younger half-sister)
~!- Albert Crossman (sworn brother)!~

__Occupation:__ 
~!Supreme Commander of the Allied Armies (formerly)!~
__Affiliations:__ Henituse Family, Roan Kingdom

 Cale‘s original personality was that of a spoiled brat. His mother died when he was very young and his father remarried and created a family he didn't like. He used to be a 'good boy', but he began acting 'trash'-y at the tender age of 8 and started drinking when he was 15. Though he liked to cause trouble, he still afforded respect to his family and the few people whom he saw worthy enough to be treated like human beings (such as his butler Ron). Cale never forced himself upon women and defended women as well, although he originally loved to drink every night until dawn. He also never beat up innocent people, only throwing (and always missing) his alcohol bottles at gangsters while drunk. 

The current Cale is just as lazy as the old Cale and wishes to live his life as the “trash” of the count's family in comfort. He has others do many things for him so that he does not have to get involved with the storyline, but somehow, he always gets involved in one way or another. He is still a very kind and gentle person to those he is close to and can be worldly-wise and generous. Sometimes he can give advice, motivate, or comfort people with his words without realizing it. He claims to dislike getting personally involved in fights, as he prefers to surround himself with strong individuals. He thinks even paper cuts hurt, let alone actual sword-fighting. In conflicts, he always seeks to keep casualties to a minimum. 

Cale is the type of person who would take responsibility in order to not have to take responsibility. He also often is unable to directly speak his true feelings of care and concern for the people he cares about but when asked about it, he would be unable to deny it. Cale doesn't realize that his actions in pursuit of his dream of a slacker life are equivalent to making the world a better place. He will also never admit to feeling sorrow or pain and would blame all his feelings on the failure to become a slacker.

characters.name: Choi  Han
characters.description:
__Occupation:__ Swordmaster, ~!Dragon Slayer!~
__Abilities:__ ~!Black Yong, Ancient Powers, Sword of Disasters, Dominating Aura, Abandoning Life!~

characters.name: Raon Mir
characters.description:
A 6 year old black dragon (he was 4 years old at the beginning of the story) who started following Cale after he was saved by him from Venion Sten. He was imprisioned and tortured by Venion for the span of four years. 

Cale gave the Dragon the name Raon Miru, pure Korean for "Joyful Dragon" after the black dragon asked him to do so.

He possesses destructive impulses but looks out for his newfound family. 

Raon would give tear-soaked apple pie slices to Cale whenever Cale overused his powers or got hurt.

characters.name: Ohn
characters.description: Member of the Cat Tribe and Hong's sister. She was taken out of the streets by Cale Henituse.

characters.name: Hong
characters.description: Member of the Cat Tribe and On's brother. He was taken out of the streets by Cale Henituse.

characters.name: Alver Crossman
characters.description: Alver Crossman is the Crown Prince of the Rowoon Kingdom and the eldest son of Zed Crossman.

characters.name: Ron Molran
characters.description: A former assassin and the father of Vicross, Ron is currently the butler of Cale Henituse.

characters.name: Lark
characters.description: Member of the Blue Wolf Tribe.

characters.name: Rosalyn
characters.description: Former Crown Princess of the Breck Kingdom and an ally to Cale. She gave up her claim to the throne to pursue her aspirations of becoming a mage. Her goal is to become the master of the Magic Tower.

characters.name: Taylor Sten
characters.description:
The eldest son of the Sten family. 

He was originally the heir of the House of Sten, but was forced out after his legs became paralyzed due to having both his knees destroyed.

characters.name: Tunka
characters.description:
Leader of the rebellion against the Whipper Kingdom's mages.

He later became the Commander-in-Chief of the Whipper Kingdom.

Tunka is very loud and arrogant; he never backs down from a fight. However, he can be quite serious and sincere, which is in contrast to his usually arrogant, idiotic personality.

At first, he is depicted as a maniac that loves fighting strong people and has no respect for the weak. Over time, due to Cale's actions, Tunka changes his mindset and begins to use his head more, gaining respect for weaker people.

characters.name: Kage
characters.description: The priestess of the God of Death and Taylor Sten’s close friend. Much to her displeasure, she is favored by the God of Death. A master of mental torture and curses.

characters.name: Eric Whilsman
characters.description: The son and heir of Count Whilsman. Eric and the original Cale Henituse were close.

characters.name: Bilose
characters.description:
The bastard son of the Flynn Merchant Guild's guild leader.

He is very talented as a merchant, and so the official children of the family hate him. He moved to the Henituse territory as it was remote, and wasn't allowed to use the Flynn family name.

characters.name: Lilly Henituse
characters.description: The youngest child of Deruth Henituse, and Cale's half-sister. While they didn't initially have much of a relationship, Cale and Lilly grow closer.
